## Running AME
 - shuffle sequences (copy core_dreme shuffle info)
 - discriminative mode
 - partitioning mode (`get_sequences(score = "col")`, `runAme(control = NA)`)

## Database input
 - different from tomtom (no list input), but can be universalmotif, dreme results, or path to file.
